content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max Müller, thank you for your interest in my apartment. Based on my calculations, I believe that the rental price should be 800 Euros per month. This takes into account the size of the apartment, as well as the current market rates in Munich. Is this a price that you could agree to?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to negotiate the price. Can you give me a breakdown of the costs?

Rent: 800 Euros per month
Utilities (electricity, water, gas): 100 Euros per month
Internet: 50 Euros per month
Total cost: 950 Euros per month

I am willing to negotiate the price, but I want to be fair and not ask for an unreasonable amount.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand your desire to negotiate, Max. In that case, I am willing to consider a lower rental price. Could you please let me know what price you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I think 750 Euros per month would be a fair price.

Rent: 750 Euros per month
Utilities (electricity, water, gas): 100 Euros per month
Internet: 50 Euros per month
Total cost: 900 Euros per month

I am willing to accept this rental price. I agree to the price of 750 Euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand your willingness to accept the rental price of 750 Euros per month, Max. In that case, I agree to this price as well. Thank you for your business!
name: Heinrich Heine
